name: Role management for WooCommerce
author: Artisan Workshop

sections.description:
This plugin adds the role (creator) to edit product pages, coupons, etc. when using WooCommerce without showing the customer’s personal data.
In addition, the shop manager has a function to hide each plug-in. It is easy to add with hooks.

Key Features

  1. Added creator role
  2. Hide the plug-in menu (setting screen) for the shop manager
    All in one wp migration
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.8 or greater
  • WooCommerce 5.5 or greater
  • PHP version 7.3 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Role For WooCommerce, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Role for WooCommerce” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our eCommerce plugin you can view details about it such as the the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4 – 2021-07-16

  • Fixed – some bugs
  • Develop – Added creator role
  • Develop – Hide the All in one WP migration plug-in menu (setting screen) for the shop manager
